titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives to the victims, their families and friends, and the people of India for the loss suffered during the terrorist attacks in Mumbai, India, on July 11, 2006.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 7/12/2006--Introduced. Condemns the July 11, 2006, terrorist attacks in Mumbai, India. Expresses: (1) condolences to the victims, their families and friends, and the government and the people of India for the loss suffered during these attacks; and (2) sympathies to the people injured in these attacks. Calls on the President to provide the government of India with investigative assistance and to work together with India to bring to justice the perpetrators of these and other terrorist attacks.
